amendatorysection.catchline: Authority; transfer to land bank authorized.
amendatorysection.para: Notwithstanding any provision of the Land Reutilization Act to the contrary, a land reutilization authority may transfer property held by such authority to a land bank created under the Nebraska Municipal Land Bank Act upon such terms and conditions as may be agreed upon between the authority and the land bank.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Municipal Land Bank Act, see section 19-5201.
